freenet.node.updater
Class UpdateOverMandatoryManager

java.lang.Object
  freenet.node.updater.UpdateOverMandatoryManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestClient
public class UpdateOverMandatoryManager
extends Object
implements RequestClient

Co-ordinates update over mandatory. Update over mandatory = updating from your peers, even though they may be so much newer than you that you can't route requests through them. NodeDispatcher feeds UOMAnnounce's received from peers to this class, and it decides what to do about them.

Author:
toad

Method Detail

handleAnnounce

public boolean handleAnnounce(Message m,
                              PeerNode source)
Handle a UOMAnnounce message. A node has sent us a message offering us use of its update over mandatory facilities in some way.

Parameters:
m - The message to handle.
source - The PeerNode which sent the message.
Returns:
True unless we don't want the message (in this case, always true).

handleRequestRevocation

public boolean handleRequestRevocation(Message m,
                                       PeerNode source)
A peer node requests us to send the binary blob of the revocation key.

Parameters:
m - The message requesting the transfer.
source - The node requesting the transfer.
Returns:
True if we handled the message (i.e. always).
